org.encog.ml
Interface MLClassification

All Superinterfaces:
MLInput, MLInputOutput, MLMethod, MLOutput
All Known Subinterfaces:
EnsembleML
All Known Implementing Classes:
ART1, BasicNetwork, BasicPNN, BayesianNetwork, FreeformNetwork, GenericEnsembleML, SOM, SVM
public interface MLClassification
extends MLInputOutput

This interface defines a MLMethod that is used for classification. Classification defines the output to be a class. A MLMethod that uses classification is attempting to use the input to place items into classes. It is assumed that an item will only be in one single class. If an item can be in multiple classes, one option is to create additional classes that represent the compound classes.

          Classify the input into a group.
